title: GE Power India gets Rs 47.27 crore order
description: GE Power India Ltd announced that it has secured a purchase order worth Rs 47.27 crore from Steag Energy Services (India) Private Ltd, excluding 18 percent GST. The order is for renovation and maintenance (R&M) work on a 600 MW boiler, which is scheduled to be completed within 6.5 months.
